Bash(# First, check if Oracle is still trying to run
ps aux | grep ""10901"" | grep -v grep | awk ''{print $2}'' | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null

# Export the environment variable
export GOOGLE_API_KEY=$(grep GOOGLE_API_KEY .env | cut -d ''='' -f2 | tr -d ''""'')

# Start the Oracle agent properly
\
export GOOGLE_API_KEY=""$GOOGLE_API_KEY"" && \
uv run python src/a2a_mcp/agents/__main__.py --agent-card agent_cards/solopreneur_oracle_agent.json --port 10901 > logs/oracle_restart2.log 2>&1 &

echo ""Starting Oracle agent with API key...""
sleep 5)

Bash(# Start Oracle agent with proper environment
export GOOGLE_API_KEY=$(grep GOOGLE_API_KEY .env | cut -d ''='' -f2 | tr -d ''""'')
cd /home/user/solopreneur
uv run python src/a2a_mcp/agents/__main__.py --agent-card agent_cards/solopreneur_oracle_agent.json --port 10901 > logs/oracle_restart3.log 2>&1 &

echo ""Oracle agent starting...""
sleep 8)
